item.title: Russian Shared Suffering
item.description: Russian Shared Suffering Suffering is more tolerable when you can see your neighbor suffering with you. [[Nothing Provokes Rage Quite Like Unfairness]]

item.title: Two Monkeys Paid Unfairly with Grapes
item.description: Two Monkeys Paid Unfairly with Grapes One monkey was paid with a cucumber, and one a far tastier grape. When the first saw the second get rewarded more for the same task, it threw a fit.
